name: VeoliaWater
0:
”Alexa, ask Veolia how much is my bill”
”Alexa, ask Veolia when did you receive last payment”
”Alexa, ask Veolia what is my account balance”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: veolia
Developer Terms of Use
des: Enable the Veolia Water skill to get access to to your water account. Inquire about your most recent bill, when we received your last payment, how to get in touch with your local Customer Service team, or learn how to conserve water. Simply link the skill with your mywater.veolia.us login to get access to your latest account updates through your Alexa enabled device.
